revised_title: Investigation of Water and Ice Absorption Spectra and Planetary Spectra
tldr: The authors investigated the absorption spectra of water and ice, comparing them to the spectra of major planets. They discovered similarities between the absorption bands in planetary spectra and those of water, suggesting that water may play a significant role in the atmospheres of these planets. However, they were unable to identify the cause of certain unidentified absorption bands in the green region of the spectra.
